column4: Inbound N Broadway at W Loudon Ave
column5: All inbound lanes are shutdown until further notice due to investigation of a serious collision near the RR bridge reportedly involving a pedestrian.  Traffic diverted to W Loudon Ave.

column4: Outbound Bryan Station Rd between Hume Rd and Briar Hill Rd
column5: Single vehicle reportedly flipped.  At least one lane is blocked.

column4: Various streets on campus will be one-way.
Ave of Champions will be closed to thru traffic between Rose St and S Limestone.
Please see the move-in map for complete details.
